title: Frandsen, Burke
maintext: Burke Frandsen, 63 Lava Hot Springs-passed away February 26, 2018. A memorial service will be held Saturday, March 3 at 11 a.m. at the Rosewood LDS chapel, 3628 S. 2700 W. West Haven Utah. Condolences and memories may be shared with the family at www.wilksfuneralhome.com 208-238-8000
